org.openimaj.image.analysis.algorithm

Class FloodFill<I extends Image<?,I> & SinglebandImageProcessor.Processable<Float,FImage,I>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openimaj.image.analysis.algorithm.FloodFill<I>
  • Type Parameters:
    I - type of image
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    ImageAnalyser<I>

    public class FloodFill<I extends Image<?,I> & SinglebandImageProcessor.Processable<Float,FImage,I>>
extends Object
implements ImageAnalyser<I>
    Flood-fill of @link{FImage}s or @link{MBFImage}s.
    Author:
    Jonathon Hare (jsh2@ecs.soton.ac.uk)

      • floodFill

        public static <T> FImage floodFill(Image<T,?> image,
                   int startx,
                   int starty,
                   float threshold)
        Flood-fill an image from the given starting pixel position with the given threshold.
        Type Parameters:
        T - The pixel type of the image
        Parameters:
        image - the image
        startx - the x-coordinate of the start pixel
        starty - the y-coordinate of the start pixel
        threshold - the threshold for determining with a pixel should be filled
        Returns:
        a binary @link{FImage} with filled pixels from the input set to 1

      • floodFill

        public static <T> FImage floodFill(Image<T,?> image,
                   Pixel start,
                   float threshold)
        Flood-fill an image from the given starting pixel position with the given threshold.
        Type Parameters:
        T - The pixel type of the image
        Parameters:
        image - the image
        start - the start pixel
        threshold - the threshold for determining with a pixel should be filled
        Returns:
        a binary @link{FImage} with filled pixels from the input set to 1
